minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Thanks for the opportunity to present. Our API integration is now handling real-world insurance data.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: Scale challenges are real I'm seeing competition heat up in insurtech. What's your competitive moat and POC?

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your burn rate metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Well, I think... our model drift is showing 92% accuracy, and the ARR is improving.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: Scale challenges are real I'm seeing competition heat up in insurtech. What's your competitive moat and SaaS metrics?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about CAC, but our POC metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Rajesh Gupta
minutes.text: I've seen this before The accuracy sounds promising, but show me the burn rate data.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The valuation timeline is tight, but we're confident about product-market fit.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Focus on scalability first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about LTV, but our product-market fit metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Focus on SaaS metrics first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.

action_items.task: Prepare detailed CAC and LTV analysis for Product Demo & Technical Reviews
